item.title: Trump visits Las Vegas to discuss tax on tips
item.description: President Donald Trump is using a stop Saturday in Las Vegas to offer details on how he can begin excluding tips from federal taxes.

item.title: CIA believes Covid-19 likely caused by lab leak, NBC News reports
item.description: "CIA continues to assess that both research-related and natural origin scenarios of the COVID-19 pandemic remain plausible."

item.title: White House makes 2,000-pound bombs available to Israel, undoing Biden's pause
item.description: Trump's White House has instructed the U.S. military to release a hold on the supply of 2,000-pound bombs to Israel, a source told Reuters on Saturday...

item.title: Trump fires at least 12 inspectors general overnight in legally murky move
item.description: A senior administration official said the move was an effort to let go of parts of the Biden administration that don’t “align” with the Trump administ...

item.title: Senate confirms South Dakota Gov. Kristi Noem as Trump's homeland security secretary
item.description: The Senate confirms South Dakota Gov. Kristi Noem as Trump's homeland security secretary.
